TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you don't get a monitor so you can't see anything. But trust me, it's running great.

 

I wish for a large assortment of real nice mustards.

You get 400,000,000,000 mustard seeds flooding your house.

I wish for a sandwitch.

granted, its a little dry

 

i wish i was even better at playing the sousaphone

granted, but you are being threatened by militant tuba players now.

 

I wish I had more time.

Time has stopped. Therefore you have both no time and infinite time. 

I wish for some gum.

Granted. But you find that the "gum" is dry Guar Gum powder.

I wish for a good grade on my next calc exam.

Granted- it's good by a mentally defeciet person's standards 

I wish for a the Dumb and Dumber Lamborghini.

You get a beat up  Lamborghini, so irreparably beat up that the salesperson says that it’s been to hell and back.

I wish for a golden anvil.

Granted. It's so malleable that it is useless as an anvil.

I wish for asteroid mining to become profitable in the  next two decades.

Edited October 23, 2018 by 0111narwhalz

Granted.......HOPE YOU HAVE MORE THAN ONE HOUSE!
 

 

I wish the earth doesnt break after the asteroid crashes in his house....

Granted, but it gets deformed into a disk instead

I wish there won't be people believing in flat earth (at least before this house asteroid incident)

Granted but there will likely be those that believe in a flattened Earth...assuming anyone survives.

Which brings me to wish that I'll survive this impending calamity.

Edited October 24, 2018 by Exploro

The asteroid punches a hole straight through the earth, supplementing the donut-earthers.

I wish that conspirators would get some brains.

Granted. Now they can easily convince you in every thing they want.

I wish the flatness of the Earth was adjustable.

4 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:

Granted. Now they can easily convince you in every thing they want.

I wish the flatness of the Earth was adjustable.

Granted. The world is now a Moebius Strip. Try explaining THAT to a flat-Earther.

"I wish that my spacecraft in KSP would not explode."

Granted. Now your spacecrafts explode outside of KSP. Before even loading the game!

I wish I had time for KSP

Granted. You now have 6 bln years to play KSP before the Sun becomes a red giant.

I wish the Sun was a good, kind giant.

Granted. He’s a cool guy, so cool in fact that no radiation reaches earth and everyone freezes to death within days.

 

I wish life would be easier.

Granted.
The life becomes absolutely easy and user-friendly.
Now it's occupied by amateur n00bs and its quality has fallen.

.I want to press this button.

Edited October 25, 2018 by kerbiloid

Granted but the button makes every vehicle in the planet explode causing the earth to explode

 

I wish  he doesn't press the button

9 hours ago, KerbolExplorer said:

Granted but the button makes every vehicle in the planet explode causing the earth to explode

 

I wish  he doesn't press the button

 

Granted, you deny the Button the chance of being pressed by    H  i  m    , but it was the bUTTON of omnipotence

I wish for an undEFINED

Granted. You start learning JavaScript.

I wish to understand why that signature bomborocket doesn't have a painted shark face.

Granted, you have full and complete understanding of military vehicle painting and understand the difference between camouflage, war paint and know in what circumstances it makes sense or not.

 

I wish to see people’s signatures without them distracting from the actual page.

Edited October 26, 2018 by Human Person

Granted. Now you don’t see signitures unless you open the spoiler they’re contained in. However, the new feature breaks posting for the next 5 years while they try to figure out what went wrong. 

I wish to see signatures on mobile

1 hour ago, 53miner53 said:

Granted. Now you don’t see signitures unless you open the spoiler they’re contained in. However, the new feature breaks posting for the next 5 years while they try to figure out what went wrong. 

I wish to see signatures on mobile.

Granted. Everyone starts using 5 pages long, absolutely disgusting, animated signatures.

I wish for immortality.
